title: John of Gaunt Inviting Guests to his Daughter's Marriage to the King of Portugal
description: John of Gaunt Inviting Guests to his Daughter's Marriage to the King of Portugal; Master of the Getty Froissart (Flemish, active about 1475 - 1485); Bruges, Belgium; about 1480 - 1483; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 48 x 35 cm (18 7/8 x 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 7, fol. 176v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
